long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Try our Poshmark bot for free! The best automation tool for your Poshmark closet. 

Increase poshmark sales, Share Your Closet, Save Time & Make Money with tools by SellerAider!

Automate actions in a Poshmark compliant way! 

Poshmark Bot/Poshmark Sharer features:
- Select all bulk listing actions checkboxes! (POSHMARK COMPLIANT: sharing, offers, edit listing)
- Share Items to Followers (Fully Automated)
- Share Items to Party  (Fully Automated)
- Pause/Resume Actions 
- Manual Helpers (POSHMARK COMPLIANT: Want to share/follow manually ? we'll make it faster for you with some useful adjustments to the screen. This is perfect for VA's and sellers who don't want to use bots!)
- Offer to Likers
- Follow/Unfollow Users 
AND MORE

Use the only poshmark compliant automation tool on the market!


Supports: Poshmark US, UK, AU & CA 

DISCLAIMER: Our app has **no** affiliation with or endorsement by Poshmark.

Support email: hey@selleraider.com
